name: Crystal Pittman
title: The Dark Sorcerer
description: A master of forbidden magic, this sorcerer wields dark powers that threaten the very fabric of reality. Their ambition to rule the world is only matched by their thirst for immortality.

name: Valerie Kelley
title: The Tyrant King
description: A ruthless ruler who commands an army of mindless soldiers, forcing those under their reign to obey or perish. Their cruelty knows no bounds, and their desire for power is insatiable.

name: Angela Hayes
title: The Shadow Assassin
description: A mysterious and elusive figure who strikes from the shadows, assassinating targets with deadly precision. Their motives are unclear, but their loyalty is to the highest bidder.

name: Amy Cherry
title: The Fallen Knight
description: Once a noble warrior, now corrupted by dark magic and vengeance. They seek to destroy those who once called them a hero, turning their blade against former allies and spreading chaos wherever they go.

name: Monica Burns
title: The Mad Scientist
description: A genius mind twisted by their own inventions. They create terrifying mechanical monstrosities, hoping to bend nature itself to their will. Their obsession with progress comes at the cost of human lives.
